text: KDOT (map legend) Ryus is an unincorporated community in Grant County, Kansas, United States. It lies in northeastern Sullivan TownshipCensus Bureau map, combined with KDOT map at the intersection of the Cimarron Valley Railroad with K-190, 14 miles (22 km) southeast of the county seat of Ulysses.Official Kansas highway map ==See also== * Santa Fe Trail ==References== ==Further reading== ==External links== * Grant County Maps: Current, Historic, KDOT Category:Unincorporated communities in Grant County, Kansas Category:Unincorporated communities in Kansas
title: Ryus, Kansas
